main.name: Mohammed Naqhid
main.description: I like to code things from scratch, and enjoy bringing ideas to life in the browser
main.contactmessage: Have me make stuff for you. If you like my work and have some cool projects to work on, just send me a direct message or contact me through social sites.

education.description: Attending Microverse involved the study of Algorithms and Data Structures, SQL syntax and statements, Full Stack Web Development with Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, React and Redux. Also based on mockups and a broad list of requirements, it was required to build complex web applications and terminal utilities.

The first year required the study of foundations of mathematics, physics, computer science, computer networks and electronics. The second year required the study of advanced mathematics and physics, and the fundamentals of electronic systems.

testimonials.text: Alexandru has a great mentality that always seeks to improve his skills. His discipline makes working with him easy and challenging at the same time. He loves to share his ideas and accomplishments with other people, which makes him very easily leave an impact in any working environment.
testimonials.user: Hillary Okello | Software Engineer - Full Stack Ruby on Rails/React.js
